column5: OK, so I just caught up on the Fishhero-Bass Thread. I am COMPLETELY offended. Pictures like that have NO PLACE on the internet!!! I almost threw up the minute I saw that HABS HAT!!!   Go Lea...I mean, Go Sen, GO CAPs!!!
I don't even watch hockey the hat was gift (lol) or was It?
"My fish was this big!!!!!!"  My link   "Doesn't matter, this is the playoffs, your OOS!"
Leafs OOS Sens OOS  Caps...............season is almost over.
It is threads like that one that have caused me to become a lurker and not a contributor.
Oh don't be so hard on yourself. 3045 posts since '07 and not one fishing report. I know you can do it....c'mon, give it a try.
